net.jawr.web.resource.bundle.postprocess.impl.css.base64
Class Base64ImageEncoderPostProcessor

java.lang.Object
  net.jawr.web.resource.bundle.postprocess.AbstractChainedResourceBundlePostProcessor
      net.jawr.web.resource.bundle.postprocess.impl.CSSURLPathRewriterPostProcessor
          net.jawr.web.resource.bundle.postprocess.impl.css.base64.Base64ImageEncoderPostProcessor
All Implemented Interfaces:
ChainedResourceBundlePostProcessor, ResourceBundlePostProcessor
public class Base64ImageEncoderPostProcessor
extends CSSURLPathRewriterPostProcessor
implements ResourceBundlePostProcessor

This class defines the post processor which encodes resources (background images) using base64 encoding.

Author:
Gerben Jorna, Ibrahim Chaehoi
